de.hs_duesseldorf.medien.mi.httphsdronelog.hsdronelog.network

Class NetworkThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • de.hs_duesseldorf.medien.mi.httphsdronelog.hsdronelog.network.NetworkThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class NetworkThread
extends Thread
    The network Thread class can sends requests to a HSDroneLog Web server and receives the incoming data. It then parses the JSON formatted data into its single elements and saves it into a Map. You can access the data with a the resultingList() method.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        Thread.State, Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

    • Field Detail

      • MESSAGEOBJECT_WHAT_REQUEST_SUCCESSFUL

        static int MESSAGEOBJECT_WHAT_REQUEST_SUCCESSFUL
        What value for sending the empty message to NetworkHandler. This value indicates that the request was successful.

      • MESSAGEOBJECT_WHAT_REQUEST_REDIRECTED

        static int MESSAGEOBJECT_WHAT_REQUEST_REDIRECTED
        What value for sending the empty message to NetworkHandler. This value indicates that the request was redirected so the current session has expired.

      • MESSAGEOBJECT_WHAT_REQUEST_NOT_SUCCESSFUL

        static int MESSAGEOBJECT_WHAT_REQUEST_NOT_SUCCESSFUL
        What value for sending the empty message to NetworkHandler. This value indicates that the request was not successful.

      • MESSAGEOBJECT_WHAT_EXCEPTION_OCCURED

        static int MESSAGEOBJECT_WHAT_EXCEPTION_OCCURED
        What value for sending the empty message to NetworkHandler. This value indicates that an Exception occurred during the request.

      • m_isRequesting

        private boolean m_isRequesting
        This value is true if there is any active request currently.

      • m_request

        private Request m_request
        The instance of the current request.

      • m_webServerURLString

        private String m_webServerURLString
        The url of the web server to call. This value does not include sub-pages of the web server.

      • m_completeURL

        private URL m_completeURL
        The complete url for the current request. This value contains the m_webServerURLString and then the request specific part for the php file.

      • m_session

        private String m_session
        The id of the session gained from a login request.

      • m_httpUrlConnection

        private HttpURLConnection m_httpUrlConnection
        This instance establishes the HTTP (or HTTPS if url is https) connection to the web server.

      • m_exceptionOccured

        private Exception m_exceptionOccured
        The exception occured during the current request

      • m_requestWasRedirected

        private boolean m_requestWasRedirected
        This value is set to true if the current request was redirected to another host.

      • m_outgoingStream

        private OutputStream m_outgoingStream
        The outgoing stream is used to send the POST message of a request via the HTTP connection.

      • m_incomingStream

        private NetworkCharsetConverterReader m_incomingStream
        The incoming stream gets the data send by the webserver. Usually this value is parsed as JSON.

      • m_charRead

        private int m_charRead
        The char read by the m_incomingStream.

      • m_jsonResultStringBuilder

        private StringBuilder m_jsonResultStringBuilder
        The result string saves the incoming data from the m_incomingStream. This message is in JSON format.

      • m_rawJSONResult

        private String m_rawJSONResult
        The json formatted result from the web server for a request. This value is a JSON String.

      • m_networkHandler

        private NetworkHandler m_networkHandler
        The Handler for this thread to gain access to the ui Thread of the app for modifications.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NetworkThread

        NetworkThread(String webServerURL)
        Creates a new Network Thread which can send requests to a HSDroneLog web server. The name of the Thread will be 'HSDroneLog Network Thread'.

        Note that before starting the Thread you have to set a NetworkHandler.
        Parameters:
        webServerURL - The Url to the web server.

    • Method Detail

      • setNetworkHandler

        void setNetworkHandler(NetworkHandler threadHandler)
        Sets the network handler for this Thread. This Handler will be noticed when a request finished.
        Parameters:
        threadHandler - The Handler for this Thread.

      • setSession

        public void setSession(String session)
        Sets the session. This method is an interface method for the network request parser.
        Parameters:
        session - The message from the web server.

      • webServerURLString

        public String webServerURLString()
        Gets the web server url. This method is an interface method for the network request parser.

      • isCurrentlyRequesting

        boolean isCurrentlyRequesting()
        Gets the working status of the network Thread.
        Returns:
        true if there is any active request.

      • openForNewRequest

        void openForNewRequest()
        Opens the network for a new request

      • resultingList

        List<Map<String,String>> resultingList()
        Gets the parsed results of the request. The maps represent objects with same attributes which were received from the url request.
        Returns:
        An instance of an List with a map for each similar object of the raw result string or null if the parsing was not successful.

      • messageFromWebServer

        String messageFromWebServer()
        Gets the message from the web server for this request. If the network was unable to receive a message from the web server this value will be null.
        Returns:
        The message from the web server or null if unable to receive a message from the server or if no request was send.

      • exceptionOccured

        Exception exceptionOccured()
        Gets the exception occured of the last request.
        Returns:
        An Exception or null if no Exception occured.

      • requestIdentificationTag

        String requestIdentificationTag()
        Gets the identification tag of the current request.
        Returns:
        The request identification tag of the current request.

      • setNewRequest

        void setNewRequest(Request request)
            throws IllegalStateException
        Sets the data of a new request for the network thread.
        Parameters:
        request - The Request object. Gets the data for the network request from this object. The request was specified in this object.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If there is an active request running or the thread has been terminated.

      • checkForIllegalState

        private void checkForIllegalState(Request request)
        Checks for an illegal state when values from a new request should been taken over.
        Parameters:
        request - The request instance.

                     throws IOException

        Throws:

                          throws IOException
        Sends data over the network using the POST method of http

      • receiveResultOfRequest

        private void receiveResultOfRequest()
                             throws IOException
        Gets the response of a request from the HSDroneLog web server. The response will be formatted as json string
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O exception occurs.

      • notifyNetworkHandler

        private void notifyNetworkHandler(int messageWhat)
        This method will be called when the current NetworkRequest ends because it was successful / not successful or an exception occured. This method indicates the parsing of the result of the current request and will call the
        Parameters:
        messageWhat - The what value of the Message.
